title: Watch and Listen: 3 Part Documentary on The xx & Wham! ‘Last Christmas' Cover
body:
After the bands’ homecoming show last night in Brixton, Pitchfork.

tv have released an intimate three-part documentary on [The xx](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/uncategorized/18734-new-the-xx-chained-john-talabot-pional-blinded-remix/ "New: The xx – Chained (John Talabot & Pional Blinded Remix)") and the making of their sophomore LP, [Coexist.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17680-new-the-xx-chained/ "New: The XX – Chained") The 3 videos feature performances of tracks “_Fiction_“, “_Angels_“, and “_Tides_”.

The band also covered **Wham**!’s ‘_Last Christmas_‘, which turned out to be only slightly better than the [**Slugabed** Remix](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18676-new-wham-last-christmas-slugabed-ruined-it/ "New: Wham! – Last Christmas (Slugabed Ruined It)") we were subjected to around a week ago.
